original: intros X m u Hmonoid n f Hn Hf. pose (S n) as k. remember (fun i : nat => f i ⊕ u) as g. assert (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> f j ⊕ g i = g i ⊕ f j) as comm_prop. { intros i j Hij. subst g. rewrite Hf; try lia. rewrite <- Heqg. rewrite Hf; lia. } rewrite msum_sum with (n := n) (f := f) (g := (fun i : nat => u)) (k := 2); try lia. rewrite msum_only_one with (n := 2) (f := (fun i : nat => u)) (i := 0); try lia. rewrite 2!msum_1. auto.
